name: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt
original_name: Dog and Beth: On the Hunt
overview: Each week, the Chapmans and their son Leland will fly from their Da Kine Bail Bonds headquarters in Hawaii to various bail bondsmen businesses around the United States as they assist in apprehending criminals. The series will also encompass the group as they improve the bail bondsmen businesses techniques on how to run more efficiently, from the writing of bonds to the tedious task of tracking criminals and technological device training.

episodes.name: Dog's New Tricks
episodes.overview: The Chapmans discover there is trouble for a bail bonds company in Denver. Dog, Beth and Leland jump at the chance to assist Mike Vester of Bail City Bail Bonds and his team of bounty hunters. The company has multiple fugitives on the run, but time is running out to capture two big money jumps. Vester knows he better catch them or pay a hefty price. The Chapmans are on a mission to show the Bail City crew how to reel in these big fish.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Clovis
episodes.overview: The Chapmans travel to the small and dusty railroad town of Clovis, New Mexico to assist Bail Bondsman Hank Bayless and his crew. Hank is itching to retire and leave the business to his daughter and granddaughter. But Hank's retirement will be put on hold until Dog, Beth, and Leland help his bounty hunters track down his two most elusive fugitives.

episodes.name: Family Bonds
episodes.overview: Dog, Beth and Leland travel to Albuquerque, New Mexico to visit with Tony Madrid, the founder and patriarch of the Madrid Family Bail Bonds business and a legend in the industry. Here, the Chapmans join forces with Tony and his family to promote vital bail bond and bounty hunter legislation at the State Capitol in Santa Fe. While the Madrids are a top-notch bail bonds family, they have some slippery fugitives on the loose. Dog, Beth and Leland take to the mean streets and desolate mesas of Albuquerque and help chase them down.

episodes.name: Going to Jackson
episodes.overview: An urgent call from Agent J motivates Dog and Beth to travel to Jackson, Michigan to help bondsman Leo Urban track down and apprehend a $500,000 fugitive bond. It's a game of cat and mouse as the Chapmans work with Leo and his crew to track down this elusive and dangerous fugitive.

episodes.name: L.A. Consequential
episodes.overview: Dog, Beth and Leland have been called to the mean streets of Los Angeles to help big-hearted bondsman Arnold who has gotten in way over his head. Arnold is on the line for a 390K payout if he doesn't hunt down a defiant fugitive. The Chapmans teach Arnold the strategies and tactics of bounty hunting in order to save his business, and how to toughen up along the way.

episodes.name: Norwalk This Way
episodes.overview: Tina, the owner of Blazen Bail Bonds in Los Angeles is struggling. Tina's personal life is taking her attention away from her business. Her books are out of whack, and a 100K bond is about to come due on a fugitive that is nowhere to be found. Dog, Beth and Leland join forces with Tina and her all-female crew to help fortify her business and hunt down several outstanding bonds.

episodes.name: Viva Dog Vegas
episodes.overview: The Chapmans are in Las Vegas for the Academy of Country Music Awards and the Professional Bail Agents of the United States conference. As senior vice president of PBUS, Beth tends to business with bail agents from all over the country while Dog and Leland take time away from the conference to help a local bondsman pull in several jumps in record time.

episodes.name: Doglahoma: A Fistful of Warrants
episodes.overview: Dog, Beth and Leland are called to Oklahoma to join up with bondsmen in Guthrie and Oklahoma City. Before they hit the road, the Chapmans head to the Rocky Mountains to hunt down a fugitive on the run from the Sooner state. Dog and Beth soon realize there is much work to be done in Oklahoma, so they extend their stay in order to help the bondsmen clean up their businesses.

episodes.name: Doglahoma 2: For a Few Bounties More
episodes.overview: Tensions in Oklahoma are high as Dog and Beth track down an elusive fugitive for bondsman Tom Trepagnier. But their work is far from over as they must reign in two more of Trepagnier's jumps while training Trep's crew and showing an Oklahoma state senator the ropes of bounty hunting.

episodes.name: Paradise Lost
episodes.overview: While the Chapmans are home in Hawaii trying to enjoy a short break from the road, they are called to shut down a terribly corrupt bondsman and hunt down his outstanding fugitives. They confront this bondsman, take charge of his operation and put him on a plane out of paradise back to Texas â€” with a warning never to return.

episodes.name: Dog Days of Kansas
episodes.overview: Dog, Beth and Leland travel to the great plains of Hutchinson, Kansas to meet with Barb Carithers and her team of bondswomen. As they chase down elusive fugitives, they discover that a deceitful bounty hunter may be taking advantage of Barb's kindness.

episodes.name: Training Dakota
episodes.overview: Leland raised his son Dakota while still a kid himself. Now Dakota is graduating from high school with honors and wants to join the family business. Eighteen-year-old Dakota claims to be a natural-born warrior, but before the Chapmans can give him his badge, he needs to prove himself on a variety of grueling tests including weapons, tactics and on one of the most exciting hunts ever on Big Island, Hawaii.

episodes.name: Rock Bottom Bounty
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth head to the wilds of Casper, Wy., to help Jeanine Beagle and the bounty hunting cowboys of Action Bail Bonds track down a dangerous Iraq War veteran gone rogue. After meeting one young fugitive who has hit rock bottom, the Chapmans organize the community to help clean up the troubled woman's life.

episodes.name: Big Sky Bounty
episodes.overview: This time, it's the bounty hunters who reach out to Dog and Beth. John Briggs and his crew at Western Bail Bonds need help reining in their bondsman boss, Andy Nelson. Andy is too distracted by his other businesses to give his bounty hunters the support they need, and the stack of jumps is growing fast. As Dog and Beth help capture his fugitives and whip his bounty hunters into shape, only one question remains: Will Andy learn his lesson and do what it takes to keep his crew safe?

episodes.name: Southern Fried Bounty
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth get a call from Bill and Renee Honea at #1 Bail Bonds in Huntsville, Ala. They have a growing stack of jumps, and Bill has tracked one desperate woman to a small suburb outside of Denver, Colo. Dog and the team are on a mission to find the fugitive and fly her back to Alabama, before heading to Huntsville to help Bill track a $60,000 runner with warrants for attempted murder.

episodes.name: Handcuffed
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth are handcuffed by the laws of Washington state as they head to Angie's Bail Bonds in Mt. Vernon. Despite the laws, the Chapmans struggle to help Angie and her bevy of bondsmen clean up their jumps.

episodes.name: Divine Intervention
episodes.overview: When Dog discovers internal strife at Randy Bosley's family-owned Pacific Northwest Bail Bonding in Seattle, he and Beth call in a higher power to help heal the rift. With the family reunited, only one question remains: Can Dog and Beth clean up Randy's jumps, and use their influence to help bring a dangerous runner back from Sacramento?

episodes.name: Trouble at Home
episodes.overview: Dog & Beth have been on the road helping others, but the jumps are piling up in Oahu. The team is called into action by Rainy Robinson, their bondsman at Da Kine Bail Bonds, to chase two fugitives that have taken advantage of the Chapman's long absence. Meanwhile, Cecily and Dakota prepare to take their bail agent licensing test. Can they pass and become the next generation of Chapman bounty hunters?

episodes.name: Best of Dog and Beth: On the Hunt
Action in Jackson, Part 1
episodes.overview: Part 1 of 2: Season 2 begins with Dog and Beth visiting Jackson, Mich., to train a young man who dreams of becoming a bondsman.

episodes.name: Action in Jackson, Part 2
episodes.overview: Conclusion: Dog and Beth visit Jackson, Mich., and help a new bondsman who wrote a bad bond for a known runner.

episodes.name: Rites of Passage
episodes.overview: In an inspiring story of family and faith, Dog and Beth visit their friends Royce and Alesia Kyser in Foley, Ala. Royce was recently diagnosed with lung cancer, and Alesia desperately needs help catching their jumps and keeping the business on track. Can Dog and Beth train Royce's children to take over the business and carry on the family legacy?

episodes.name: Fathers and Sons
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth head up to Sacramento, Calif., to visit their old friend Topo Padilla. Topo runs a family business with his father Greg and son Brandon -- three generations of bounty hunters -- just like the Chapmans. When Dakota and Brandon are tasked with leading the hunt for a dangerous fugitive, it's the challenge of a lifetime. Only one question remains -- can they catch their man, and make their fathers proud?

episodes.name: Rude Awakening
episodes.overview: When Dog and Beth visit Leland on the Big Island, their vacation quickly turns into a hunt. Leland has two tough jumps in the rural wilds of Hilo. There are a lot of places to hide in the backcountry, but you don't want to be caught napping if Dog's in town. Can Dog turn the fugitive's dreams of freedom into a rude awakening?

episodes.name: Love Conquers All
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth's old friend Leo Urban from Leo's Bail Bonds in Mason, Mich., is getting married. The last time Dog and Beth saw Leo, they were hunting Ricky Wheeldon, one of the nation's most wanted criminals. This time it's all about celebrating Leo's love for his new bride. With the wedding only days away, Leo has a lot on his plate, so Dog and Beth decide to pitch in and help. Can they clean up Leo's jumps before the wedding, so Leo can relax and enjoy his honeymoon?

episodes.name: Long Arm of the Dog
episodes.overview: Veteran Alabama bondsman Gage Huffstetler of Fast Feet Bail Bonds reaches out to Dog and Beth with an emergency. She has a jump that has run to California, and the court has suspended her bail license until she brings him in. Can Dog and Beth help Gage catch her fugitive and get the business back on track?

episodes.name: Desert Justice
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth journey to the Land Of Enchantment to help out ex-judge Erminio Martinez and his daughter Amy at Tony Madrid Bail Bonds in Taos, New Mexico. It's just the two of them, and it's hard to keep up with the growing stack of skips. When a drug-addicted runner threatens to leave the state, it takes all of the team's experience and technology to track him. Can Dog and Beth find him before he vanishes into the New Mexico desert?

episodes.name: Big Easy Bounty
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth visit New Orleans to help a bail bondsman train his two daughters and niece to safely track and capture fugitives.

episodes.name: Jambalaya Justice
episodes.overview: Beth takes Steve Donnes' Statewide team under her wing and pushes their training to the next level. The preparation comes in handy when they must pursue a fleeing fugitive.

episodes.name: Music City Mayhem
episodes.overview: On the outskirts of Nashville, Tennessee, Dog and Beth help a bondsman.

episodes.name: There's Something About Mary Ellen
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth head back to Colorado to help their old friend and mentor Mary Ellen Pollack at Mary Ellen's Bail Bonds. Mary wrote a big bond for a robbery suspect, now he's missed court and she's left holding the bag. With over $70,000 on the line and her whole business in jeopardy, can Dog and Beth find Mary's fugitive before he breaks the bank?

episodes.name: Rocky Mountain Menace
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth help a bondsman bring in a belligerent man and chase a menacing meth head who allegedly stole a car.

episodes.name: Family Fugitive
episodes.overview: The Chapmans are back in Hawaii, but there is no rest from chasing the wicked as they must head to Kona to help Leland and Kaleo capture a set of dangerous criminals. Kaleo must put business in front of blood to hunt down his brother-in-law. Can they tame the wild roads and jungles of Kona and put family aside to bring the fugitives in, or will there be problems in paradise?

episodes.name: Birthday Special, Part One
episodes.overview: Be prepared for an episode full of surprises as Beth and the Chapman clan put together a secret party for Dog's birthday. Things are going well at first, but when Dog's long-lost son Christopher arrives, the whole party suddenly hangs in the balance. Will he be able to bond with his siblings or will the family be brought to its knees as he awkwardly tries to fit in? Will Beth be able to put one over on the greatest bounty hunter who ever lived?

episodes.name: Birthday Special, Part Two
episodes.overview: The surprises continue as the craziness of the Chapman party draws near. Tension rises as Beth desperately hurries to complete all her secret plans for Dog's surprise birthday party. As the big day draws near, Chris, Leland and Dakota decide to create a new surprise of their own -- a striptease from Chris. Will the party go off without a hitch? Or will Chris' striptease ruin everything Beth has been planning?

episodes.name: Rites of Passage
episodes.overview: Dog and Beth are called into action by Royce and Alesia Kyser at A+ Bail Bonds in Alabama. Royce has recently fallen ill, the stack of jumps is growing, and Alesia is desperate for help. Can Dog and Beth train Royce's kids to carry on the family legacy?
